actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the volume cap and certain other restrictions applicable to qualified veterans' mortgage bonds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the volume cap and certain other restrictions applicable to qualified veterans' mortgage bonds. Repeals the termination on March 15, 1987, of the exception for certain established programs from the denial of tax exemption to consumer loan bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the volume cap and certain other restrictions applicable to qualified veterans' mortgage bonds, and for other purposes.
